item.title: Gopls
item.description: Gopls Intro Mid of 2018, I decided to switch from Java to Go. Language change leads to change editor and whole ecosystem and workflow such as doing my job primarily from the terminal. At the very beginning of my Go journey, I tried Vim as an editor(with vim-go), but I gave up because of a double burden such as learning a new language and a new editor at the same time.
